Database¶

Database related functions and classes

class schema.Config[source]¶

using the global variable saving in command line

class schema.Song(**kwargs)[source]¶

create a table name Song with the following schema

class insert_data.ReadData[source]¶

Acquire song data from the url provided by Turi and save it into local database.

drop_freq_low(song_df)[source]¶

delete user who listen to less than 5 songs

Parameters:song_df (pd.DataFrame) – a dataframe containing song data

Returns: pd.DataFrame: a dataframe without users who listen to less than 5 songs

random_select_user(song_df, n)[source]¶

randomly select n users from the song dataframe

Parameters:
  • song_df (pd.DataFrame) – a dataframe containing song data
  • n (int) – number of users
Returns:

a dataframe containing song data from n number of users
Return type:

pd.DataFrame
readSongData()[source]¶

read song data from the url provided by Turi. If the data has already exist, then read data from pickle file.

Returns: pd.DataFrame: a dataframe contain the data needed for building the recommender system
